segments.text: My attention is drawn to the boy in the center.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's standing on a small two-step stool, which looks quite unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Those legs are splayed out, making it seem like it could tip at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's really stretching up, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can see a "COOKIE JAR" inside, filled with delicious-looking treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is already in the jar, while the other holds a plate, perhaps to catch his loot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a very risky maneuver he's attempting.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If that stool goes, he's going down with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling and hurting himself makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined, though, to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl nearby is watching him intently, her arm raised in anticipation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a coordinated effort, this cookie raid.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just hope he manages to stay upright and safe.
segments.speaker: PAR
